channel.title: Comments on: White/Barcellos Interview: Bonus Footage – bloopers

item.title: By: James
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: If the Owensboro phonebook does'nt do the trick I'd be happy to send Richard a Philadelphia phonebook :-)

item.title: By: Brad
item.dc:creator: Brad
item.description:
Fascinating. Dr White remained dignified even in the midst of such difficult circumstances. Great shout outs from the camera man... I like that Jeremy. :)
Thanks guys... This was fun to listen to.
